Title: Establishes standards for the design and construction of all-gender bathrooms
Summary: Establishes standards for the design and construction of all-gender bathrooms in the state and in New York city; provides standards will be permitted in both new construction and existing structures undergoing repair, renovation, or alteration work.
LawCode: Amd ยง378, Exec L; add ยง403.5, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing standards for the design and construction of all-gender bathrooms
